attributes.action: make all private mobile phone numbers X directory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Your mobile number will automaticly be available for anyone to trace unless you request it is X directory. I believe our human right to privacy and data protection means that all numbers should be automaticly X directory. Surely the Government has got it wrong! I believe only those people who wish for their mobie numbers to be available should have to contact the Mobile Directory Company to release their number into the public domain.
